abstract: Senate Republicans' proposed jobs package would not reduce unemployment or spur the economy's growth in the next year or two, according to a forecasting firm that predicted that President Obama's plan would achieve both goals.
snippet: Senate Republicans' proposed jobs package would not reduce unemployment or spur the economy's growth in the next year or two, according to a forecasting firm that predicted that President Obama's plan would achieve both goals.
lead_paragraph: Senate Republicans' proposed jobs package would not reduce unemployment or spur the economy's growth in the next year or two, according to a leading economic forecasting firm that has predicted that President Obama's plan would achieve both goals.

headline.main: Republican Plan Would Not Help Economy, Firm Projects
